entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: The location where Harry had to bunny hop up to, described as a place that students live in.

entities.name: leg-locker curse
entities.description: A magical curse that causes people's legs to stick together, mentioned by Hermione and Neville.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: The person who leapt up and performed the counter-curse to break the Leg-Locker Curse.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: The person whose legs were stuck together by the Leg-Locker Curse, helped by Hermione.

relationships.description: Hermione performed a counter-curse to break the Leg-Locker Curse.
Neville's legs were stuck together by the curse, but Hermione helped him by performing a counter-curse.
